title: Snow day ziggs?
body:
Hi everyone
I love ziggs and i use the snow day skin from that mk thing
Will this skin will ever come back to the store?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

He's legacy, so yes, it's likely he'll return to the store! Keep an eye out for him this winter. :]
